BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISSRT_OVER_TIME_RATE_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_OT_RATE_ID, STR_OT_RATE_CODE, NUM_OT_RATE_PER_HOUR, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISSRT_OVER_TIME_RATE_MST SET STR_OT_RATE_CODE=?, NUM_OT_RATE_PER_HOUR=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?, GNUM_ISVALID=?, GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_OT_RATE_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISSRT_OVER_TIME_RATE_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.GNUM_SLNO=? and T.NUM_OT_RATE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISSRT_OVER_TIME_RATE_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_OT_RATE_ID, STR_OT_RATE_CODE, NUM_OT_RATE_PER_HOUR, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISSRT_OVER_TIME_RATE_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_OT_RATE_ID, STR_OT_RATE_CODE, NUM_OT_RATE_PER_HOUR, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISSRT_OVER_TIME_RATE_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where NUM_OT_RATE_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and GNUM_SLNO=?
UPDATE PISSRT_OVER_TIME_RATE_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? ,GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_OT_RATE_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and STR_OT_RATE_CODE=?
